name: The Legend of the Peixaralho
description:
This is a prototype made during LDJam 44th Edition, is about a sacred fish with a peculiar shape rumored to give incredible powers to any warrior that touches him, at a cost. Two warriors named Valdomiro and Cleide made up to where the Peixaralho lives, and engaged into a fast-paced battle for power.

Controls:

  1. Player 1: Use A and D to move, W to Jump and Left Ctrl to Shoot.
  2. Player 2: Use Left and Right Arrows to move, Up Arrow to jump and Right Ctrl to shoot.

Made using Unreal Engine 4.22.1

Team Members:

  • Brenno Fagundes da Silva as Main Programmer.
  • Walter Pimentel as Game Designer and Graphic Designer.
  • Murilo Ryusuke as Programmer.
  • João Vitor Alves Silva as Graphic Designer.
